items.text: tossed up outside off that time, he comes to forward to the pitch of the ball and defends with bat close to pad
too short, on middle and turning away, he tries to clip it but it takes the pad to roll to short fine
fuller on middle, tossed up, big stretch out to defend
pushed to cover
tossed up on off again, he comes well forward to defend back to the bowler
fuller outside off, throws his bat at it, a thick outside edge towards third man

items.preText: Samrat Ahuja: "Shai Hope or Hetmeyet? Who would IPL teams would rather like to have in their squad?" -- I would go with Hetmyer for T20s
items.text: offcutter, length on the pads, tucked away behind square
length outside off, stays beside the line and defends
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, no run

items.text: short of length, punched towards extra cover
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, no run

items.preText: Shoeb: "Anybody remembers any incident where lengthy arguments with umpires brought in positive outcomes?" -- Good point
items.text: length, way outside off, Chase reaches out for it but fails to connect
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, no run

items.text: length, on the stumps, this one kept low as well, pushed towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Chase, no run

items.text: length on middle and leg and spinning further away, the keeper also fails to collect

length and spinning sharply across the batsman, Mushfiqur moves across swiftly this time and dislodges the bails, a big appeal for stumping, referred upstairs. Was Chase's foot in the air when the bails came off? It's touch and go, we have zoomed in pictures, split screen, stump cam to verify from every angle. We have got a double zoom but it's all pixels there. Nothing conclusive and that stays not out. Was another wide as well
items.postText: Time for drinks. Meanwhile, Isam pings me that Ashley Giles and Rahul Dravid did ball-by-ball commentary for us in 2012.

items.text: fuller on the off stump, drives it towards long-off
fuller outside off, lunges forward and defends

items.preText: TQ: "Must say, Chase's wagon wheel looks interesting atm" -- Nice spot, a single each everywhere except extra cover, long-on and midwicket
items.text: length around off, defended on the front foot
flatter this time, on the off stump, comes forward and blocks
fuller on middle and leg, flicked towards short midwicket
strays down the leg side and Hope sweeps it fine, past short fine leg beating the fielder on his right for four

items.preText:
Tanzin: "@hemant : which match?share the link please"

Samin: "@Isam @Hemant Wait really? Link for their commentary?" -- Let me check the archives, guys

Here is Mustafizur
items.text: starts with a leg side wide
length, angling across the batsman, driven towards deep extra cover
length outside off, stays back and dabs it down to third man

items.preText:
Asif Neloy: "I remember Athar Ali Khan was adjudged OUT on a similar toe touching situation on 1998 Asia Cup. He was on '"the then" highest individual score for a Bangladeshi batsman,82 which stood highest for a long period of time."

Around the wicket
items.text: length outside off, steered towards point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: short of length outside off, Hope stays beside the line and punches it past the point fielder
length, just outside off, punched towards point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run
